title: The complete ordered field of the real numbers

blocks.name: retopn
blocks.content: The topology of the real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: recms
blocks.content: The real numbers form a complete metric space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: reust
blocks.content: The Uniform structure of the real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm reust() {
  |- wceq(cfv(cuss, crefld), cfv(cmetu, cres(cfv(cds, crefld), cxp(cr, cr))))
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(cuss, crefld), cfv(cmetu, cres(cfv(cds, crefld), cxp(cr, cr))), co(cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)), crest, cxp(cr, cr)), cfv(cmetu, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr))))
  3eqtri(cfv(cuss, crefld), co(cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)), crest, cxp(cr, cr)), cfv(cuss, co(ccnfld, cress, cr)), co(cfv(cuss, ccnfld), crest, cxp(cr, cr)))
  fveq2i(cuss, crefld, co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  df-refld()
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cuss, co(ccnfld, cress, cr)), co(cfv(cuss, ccnfld), crest, cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(cr, universe))
  reex()
  ressuss(cr, universe, ccnfld)
  oveq1i(cfv(cuss, ccnfld), crest, cxp(cr, cr), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)))
  cnflduss(cfv(cuss, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(cuss, ccnfld))
  mp3an(wceq(co(cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)), crest, cxp(cr, cr)), cfv(cmetu, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)))), wne(cr, emptycls), wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cpsmet, cc)), wss(cr, cc))
  ne0ii(cr, nat0)
  0re()
  ax-mp(wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cpsmet, cc)), wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cxmet, cc)))
  cnxmet()
  xmetpsmet(ccom(cabs, cmin), cc)
  ax-resscn()
  restmetu(cr, ccom(cabs, cmin), cc)
  fveq2i(cmetu, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)), cres(cfv(cds, crefld), cxp(cr, cr)))
  reseq1i(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr), cfv(cds, crefld))
  reds()
}

blocks.name: recusp
blocks.content: The real numbers form a complete uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2017.)
